name: DIY Ice Cream Popsicle - Summer Icy Desserts Maker
name_original: DIY Ice Cream Popsicle - Summer Icy Desserts Maker
description:
DIY Ice Cream Popsicle - Summer Icy Desserts Maker is an educational game developed by Crazy Camp Media.
DIY Ice Cream Popsicle - Summer Icy Desserts Maker is available on Android. The game is sold via Google Play.
